displayProperties.name: Firesprite
displayProperties.description: A luminous concentration of [Solar] Solar energy. When picked up, Firesprites grant grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Shatter
displayProperties.description:
When a frozen target is shattered, they take damage and deal damage to nearby targets. 

Shatter damage causes [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions to be stunned.

displayProperties.name: Radiant
displayProperties.description:
Your weapons are enhanced by the power of the Traveler and deal increased damage to combatants. 

While you are radiant, your weapons pierce the shields of [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions and stun them.

displayProperties.name: Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotic Gear and Catalyst quests

displayProperties.name: Playlists
displayProperties.description: Vanguard, Crucible and Gambit quests

displayProperties.name: Blind
displayProperties.description:
Combatants are disoriented and cannot fire their weapons. Opposing Guardians' HUD is removed and their vision is obscured.

When blinded, [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions are stunned.

displayProperties.name: New Light
displayProperties.description: Quests related to New Light, tutorials and introductions

displayProperties.name: Invisibility
displayProperties.description: You vanish from sight and do not appear on radar. While invisible, your radar range is reduced. Performing offensive actions will end invisibility.

displayProperties.name: Unravel
displayProperties.description:
The target is permeated with destructive [Strand] Strand matter. As they take additional damage, they create unraveled projectiles that seek out nearby targets.

Unraveling Rounds from your [Strand] Strand weapons pierce the shields of [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions and stun them.

Unraveled targets unwind into a Tangle when defeated.

displayProperties.name: Scorch
displayProperties.description:
The target is singed by destructive [Solar] Solar Light, taking damage over time. Scorch damage increases as the target accumulates more Scorch stacks.

After enough Scorch stacks are applied to the target, they ignite.

displayProperties.name: Tangle
displayProperties.description:
A knot of [Strand] Strand matter, swirling with potential. Tangles can be shot and destroyed, or picked up and thrown, dealing damage.

Defeating targets afflicted by any [Strand] Strand debuff will unwind them and create a Tangle.

displayProperties.name: The Past
displayProperties.description: Quests from past expansions

displayProperties.name: Overshield
displayProperties.description: You are armored with a protective barrier of [Void] Void Light. Reduces damage taken from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Sever
displayProperties.description:
The target's connections to the world around them are cut, and their outgoing damage is significantly reduced.

Severed targets unwind into a Tangle when defeated.

displayProperties.name: Suppression
displayProperties.description:
The target is taken out of any active abilities and cannot activate any abilities or movement modes while suppression persists. Afflicted combatants cannot fire their weapons.

When suppressed, [Disruption] Overload Champions are stunned.

displayProperties.name: Suspend
displayProperties.description:
The target is immobilized by a web of [Strand] Strand matter, lifting them into the air. While suspended, Guardians are unable to move freely, combatants are unable to move or fire their weapon, and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions are stunned.

Suspended targets unwind into a Tangle when defeated.

displayProperties.name: Threadling
displayProperties.description: A creature woven from pure Strand matter that seeks nearby targets and attacks, dealing damage.

displayProperties.name: Lightfall
displayProperties.description: Quests from the latest expansion

displayProperties.name: Freeze
displayProperties.description:
The target is trapped in [Stasis] Stasis matter and is unable to move.

After taking additional damage while frozen, the target shatters.

displayProperties.name: Devour
displayProperties.description: Feast on the energy of your defeated foes. Final blows restore you to full health, grant grenade energy, and extend Devour.

displayProperties.name: Woven Mail
displayProperties.description: Your body is encased in a protective mesh of tightly woven [Strand] Strand matter, greatly reducing any incoming non-precision damage.

displayProperties.name: Jolted
displayProperties.description:
The target is energized with destructive [Arc] Arc Light. They take additional damage while jolted and chain lightning to nearby targets.

Jolt damage causes [Disruption] Overload Champions to be stunned.

displayProperties.name: Cure
displayProperties.description: You are healed in a burst of mending [Solar] Solar Light.

displayProperties.name: Ignition
displayProperties.description: A large [Solar] Solar explosion which deals damage in an area around the target and stuns [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Amplified
displayProperties.description:
Your movement speed and weapon handling are greatly increased. After sprinting for a short time, your movement speed is further increased.

Rapidly defeating targets with [Arc] Arc damage makes you amplified.

displayProperties.name: Void Breach
displayProperties.description: A dimensional rupture teeming with [Void] Void energy. When picked up, Void Breaches grant class ability energy.

displayProperties.name: Weaken
displayProperties.description: The target takes increased damage and has their movement speed slowed. Afflicted combatants have difficulty firing accurately.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Crystal
displayProperties.description:
A crystal of solidified [Stasis] Stasis matter. Upon creation, freezes nearby combatants and slows nearby players.

Crystals can be destroyed, dealing damage in an area.

displayProperties.name: Restoration
displayProperties.description: You regenerate health and shields over time. Cannot be interrupted by taking damage.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal
displayProperties.description: Quests from the current season

displayProperties.name: Ionic Trace
displayProperties.description: A bolt of pure [Arc] Arc energy that travels along the ground, seeking toward its creator. When picked up, Ionic Traces grant ability energy.
Vanguard, Crucible and Gambit quests
